intelliqos.title: IntelliQoS
intelliqos.description: Manages available bandwidth of your internet connection. It dynamically allocates the necessary speed for more demanding applications, e. g. to avoid delay, jitter and packet loss.

connection-speed-section.title: Internet connection bandwidth
connection-speed-section.description: IntelliQoS requires you to enter contracted bandwidth or use the 'Speed test' button.

alert.no-internet: Cannot connect to the server. Please check your Internet connection.
